body_html: @apaszke , @michaelhuang74 : even though the cublas error is gone, the LBFGS optimizer is still not usable in FP16 mode - I am getting all black images when trying to use it in a similar script. Adam optimizer, on the other hand, works in FP16 but produces uninteresting images. Any ideas if LBFGS can be fixed (or Adam tweaked to produce output similar to LBFGSP) ?
